dcterms:description: The COCO-Tasks dataset comprises about 40,000 images where the most suitable objects for 14 tasks have been annotated, allowing for task-driven object detection.
dcterms:title: COCO-Tasks

dcterms:creator: Tsung-Yi Lin

dcterms:description: The COCO dataset is a large-scale object detection, segmentation, and captioning dataset that provides a rich set of images with annotations.
dcterms:title: COCO

dcterms:creator: Mark Everingham
SM Ali Eslami
Luc Van Gool
Christopher K.I. Williams
John Winn
Andrew Zisserman
dcterms:description: The Pascal VOC dataset is a benchmark in visual object category recognition and detection, providing a standard dataset for evaluating object detection algorithms.
dcterms:title: Pascal VOC
